snippet: Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein, the new chief, warned against ill-conceived quarantines. He also said his agency needed more money to combat multiple crises.
lead_paragraph: Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein, the new chief, warned against ill-conceived quarantines. He also said his agency needed more money to combat multiple crises.

headline.main: U.N. Rights Chief Warns Against Anti-African Discrimination Over Ebola
